name: Escape the Snake
description:
Escape the Snake is a camouflaging chameleon stealth game created for Portland Indie Game Squad's 3-Button 3-Colour "One More Time!" Game Jam

What are the three colours?  Red, green, and brownish olive green. I admit that it is the ugliest possible colour scheme but it works thematically.

What are the three buttons? Press the red button to stop or go. You must be stopped to change colour. Press the green button to get greener and the brownish olive green to get browner.

How does it match the One More Time theme? Whether you get eaten or succeed in avoiding the snake, the game starts over again, forever.

Why is it so hard? A regrettable lack of forgiveness mechanics.

Is it even possible? Yes. I have uploaded a video just to prove it can hypothetically be beaten.
